name: Behemoth
description:
Hell has been invaded !!!

Now you, The Fallen Behemoth, will butcher your way to the circle of Heresy and Take Hell Back!!!

If you find any bug or if you think that something could be improved please comment!

Badass Soundtrack made by DoomPowerMetal !

Checkout DoomPowerMetal on Youtube:

www.youtube.com/channel/UCPhU75wkCF7vFehZ-svCNDg
